## Problem 1
```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data(brfss_smart2010)
```

```{r}
problem1_data =
  brfss_smart2010 %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  filter(topic == "Overall Health" ) %>%
  mutate(response = as.factor(response)) %>%
  select(-class, -topic, -question, -sample_size, -(confidence_limit_low : geo_location))
```
